message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I'm interested in the product, I'm only comfortable going up to $10,500 at this point. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $11,000.  This product is worth a lot to me, and I believe it would be valuable to you as well.
